participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Jake is hardworking and dedicated, with a nurturing side that shines through his love for his cats.
participant_1.background: my cats are very special to me. i'm a construction worker. my dad taught me everything i know. i've 5cats.

participant_2.name: Sofia
participant_2.personality: Sofia is adventurous and creative, with a strong sense of community and a passion for music.
participant_2.background: i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i play several instruments. i volunteer at the homeless shelter. my father played violin professionally.
